welcome.title: Welcome to Ritual
welcome.subtitle: Your private intimacy tracker
welcome.description: Track your intimate moments privately and securely. All your data is encrypted and stored only on your device.

profile.title: Create Your Profile
profile.subtitle: Tell us a bit about yourself
profile.description: This information helps personalize your experience and is stored securely on your device.
profile.name: Your Name
profile.partnerNameHelper: This will be used as a default when logging activities together.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.subtitle: Your data is yours alone
privacy.description: Ritual does not share your data with anyone. Everything is stored locally on your device, ensuring your privacy.

tracking.title: Track Your Intimacy
tracking.subtitle: Log your activities easily
tracking.description: Record your intimate activities with ease. Ritual helps you keep track of your experiences and feelings.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: What Ritual offers
features.description: Ritual provides a simple and intuitive interface to log your activities, view statistics, and manage your data securely.

onboarding.biometricDescription: Use your fingerprint or face to secure your data

error.title: Setup Error
error.message: There was an error setting up the app. Please try again.

empty.title: You don't have entries yet

success.title: Backup created
success.message: Your backup has been successfully created

clearData.title: Clear Data
clearData.subtitle: This will delete all your data
clearData.confirmMessage: This action cannot be undone and will delete all your entries and settings.

success.title: Data Cleared
